mapper.insert: insert into mtb_type_size (sub_item_code, model_code, figure, size_number, adjust_class, order_pattern, type_size, type_size_1_intack, type_size_2_intack, type_size_1_outtack, type_size_2_outtack, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at ) values (#{subItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{figure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sizeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{typeSize1Intack,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{typeSize2Intack,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{typeSize1Outtack,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{typeSize2Outtack,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select sub_item_code, model_code, figure, size_number, adjust_class, order_pattern, type_size, type_size_1_intack, type_size_2_intack, type_size_1_outtack, type_size_2_outtack, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at from mtb_type_size
